message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $150 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm willing to pay $80 for the product.  Let me know if you're interested in that price.
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're on a budget, but I'm afraid $80 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $115. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $115 is still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's my final offer.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're trying to be reasonable, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $95. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'll counteroffer at $110. What do you think?
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $100. This is truly my final offer. If we can't agree, I'll have to explore other options.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $100, so I'll counteroffer at $105. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
